name: Neon Pink Star Shaped Glitter - Solvent Resistant -
description:
We are happy to announce here at Cherry Poppin' Nails we are broadening our horizons and always looking for new and quirky products for you!

Super cute Neon Pink Star shaped glitter in a medium size is completely solvent resistant so can be used in polish base, nail art, epoxy resin creations, embedding into gel and so many more things.

The quantities available are 3 Grams, 5 Grams, 10 Grams and Nail Art/Sample Baggies. If you require a larger quantity please feel free to contact us!

As always, Cherry Poppin' Nails sells nothing but high quality, solvent resistant glitter unless otherwise stated and offers worldwide combined shipping from Australia on all products.

name: Neon Nail Spikes 20 Pack
description:
We are happy to announce here at Cherry Poppin' Nails we are broadening our horizons and always looking for new and quirky products for you!

These Neon Nail Spikes are uniquely gorgeous and will make any manicure pop with the exciting neon colours!
These are made out of a hard rubberised plastic and can be stuck to the nail with nail glue OR a small amount of your desired brand of acrylic. 

For best results grab a nail file and give the flat bottom of the spike a quick rough file, as a rough surface will stick better and for longer!

Each pack has 20 pcs and is mixed colour.

As always, Cherry Poppin' Nails sells nothing but high quality, solvent resistant glitter unless otherwise stated and offers worldwide combined shipping from Australia on all products.

name: Polish Addict Nail Color 'Island Girl' INDIE POLISH DESTASH
description:
Going through my massive collection of Indie Polishes and i've noticed a lot of doubles, so I have decided to sell these so they can go to new homes.

New and UNUSED

Here we have Polish Addict Nail Color 'Island Girl'.

This is a creamy shimmer glitter polish, please check appropriate sources for swatches before purchasing so you know this polish is right for you!

Shipping within Australia or to the US, please note that if purchasing from the US you accept that once your parcel is posted you are taking the risk of the item possibly not making it through customs. I take no responsibility for this happening, please consider this when making a purchase.

name: Mickey Mouse Shaped Solvent Resistant Glitter - Black or Pink
description:

As always, these are solvent resistant and perfect for use in polish base, nail art, adding to epoxy resin and a whole range of other fun things!

Cherry Poppin' Nails only sells high quality, solvent resistant glitter unless stated otherwise and offers worldwide combined shipping from Australia.

name: White Snowman Shaped Solvent Resistant Glitter
description:

As always, these are solvent resistant and perfect for use in polish base, nail art, adding to epoxy resin and a whole range of other fun things!

Cherry Poppin' Nails only sells high quality, solvent resistant glitter unless stated otherwise and offers worldwide combined shipping from Australia.

name: Matte Black Moustache Shape Solvent Resistant Glitter
description:
We are happy to announce here at Cherry Poppin' Nails we are broadening our horizons and always looking for new and quirky products for you!

And we are super excited to introduce these mustache shaped glitter, available in matte black and completely solvent resistant so perfect for adding into your polish base, nail art, acrylic mixing, mixing into epoxy resin and anything your heart desires!

As always, Cherry Poppin' Nails sells nothing but high quality, solvent resistant glitter unless otherwise stated and offers worldwide combined shipping from Australia on all products.

name: Skull Shaped Glitter Solvent Resistant - 11 Colours -
description:
We are happy to announce here at Cherry Poppin' Nails we are broadening our horizons and always looking for new and quirky products for you!

Enter skull shaped glitter! 

Who doesn't want a skull on their nails? For a rock chic look, something a little spooky or just to stray from the crowd we have sourced this glitter.
Did we say it is COMPLETELY SOLVENT RESISTANT? You can use this in polish frankening, nail art, glitter mixing, adding to epoxy resin creations the list is endless! 

Currently available in 3 gram and 5 gram quantities, also available are Nail Art Baggys, which are smaller quantities for use such as glitter placement or nail decoration.

Colours available are -
Matte Red
Matte Blue
Matte White
Matte Orange
Matte Light Pink
Matte Yellow
Matte Peach
Matte Black
Matte Light Purple
Matte Purple 
Matte Green


Rest assured that all glitters available from us at Cherry Poppin' Nails are high quality solvent resistant glitter unless stated otherwise!

Worldwide combined shipping is available on all products!

name: 'Pretty Rave Girl' Glitter Mix
description:
Pretty Rave Girl is a bright mix full of large matte neon hex glitter and micro matte neon glitter in blue, pink, yellow and green.

Pretty Rave Girl is sure to make your nails pop and stand out.

This mix comes in 5 or 10 gram sizes.

As always our glitter mixes are made with high quality solvent resistant glitter so raw mixes can be mixed in with polish base and gel products.

Worldwide combined postage available.

name: Silver Pyramid Studs 50 for $3
description:
Silver Pyramid Studs for nail art, or art projects.

Easy to glue flat back for sticking to surfaces.

Comes in a pack of 50 for $3.

Combined postage is available worldwide.

name: 'Hocus Pocus, Mucus Pukus'  Glitter Mix
description:
A fun multi-coloured glitter bomb mix of matte yellow, grey, pink, green, peach and plum coloured glitter in a range of different shapes and sizes mixed with violet holographic large dot glitter.

Available in 5 or 10 gram quantities.

As always our glitter mixes are made with high quality solvent resistant glitter so raw mixes can be mixed in with polish base and gel products.

Worldwide combined postage available.

name: Neon Square Nail Studs 100 for $4
description:
Made super bright to make a statement!

You can use these nail studs on just a feature nail or apply to more. Easy to use, just apply to almost dry polish or use a small amount of nail glue!

Comes in the amount of 100 for $4 in the following neon colours - 
-Purple
-Pink
-Yellow
-Green
-Multi-color Pack

name: Swarovski Rhinestones - 50 for $4 -11 Colours to Choose -
description:
Swarovski Rhinestone

Gorgeous Swarovski flat back rhinestones in a range of colours to choose from:

-Amethyst SS10
-Cobalt  SS16
-Crystal AB  SS10
-Hematite  SS10
-Hyacinth  SS16
-Jet Black  SS10
-Jonquil  SS10
-Light Amethyst  SS10
-Light Colorado Topaz  SS10
-Light Peach   SS10
-Peridot  SS10

Each colour and size is listed in the options below for purchase, in sizes SS10 or SS16.

$4 FOR 50

Shipping is available worldwide, and shipping is always combined if more than one item is purchased!

name: Steam Punk Mini Watch Parts
description:
These tiny mini watch parts are perfect for steam punk fans, encapsulate in acrylic or gel and look in awe at the finished product.

Amazing designs can be made with these!

Contains many different parts of watches, for example: mini cogs, time hands etc.

Comes in packs of approx 200+ pieces or 1 gram by weight.

name: Leopard Print Heart Flatbacks 13mm
description:
Super cute leopard print heart flatbacks are ideal for those that like larger bling on their nails, and can also be used to decorate phone cases.

Size: 13mm
Packs: Comes in packets of 10

name: 3mm Rhinestones 100 Per Pack - Multiple Colours to Choose From
description:
Perfect for nail art or even phone case decoration, these rhinestones are gorgeous and add a little sparkle to your life!

Size: 3mm
Packs: Comes in packs of 100 pieces. 
Colours: Red, Black, Pink Rose and Purple.

name: Hello Kitty Faux Crystal Photo Prop
description:
Gorgeous Hello Kitty photo props!

Great for use when taking photos of nails, swatches or even products to add a little personal touch to your photos!

Size: 31mm x 28mm

Fits perfectly in the palm of your hand.

These come in pink or clear.

name: 'Acid Trip' Thermal Glitter/Acrylic Mix
description:
Acid Trip is a thermal pigmented mix that changes colour from purple to pink when warm.

Mixed with matte candy blue and pink glitters that really pop when the colour changes!

This mix only comes pre-mixed with high quality acrylic due to the thermal pigment used.

Available Pre-Mixed with Clear Acrylic Powder in 5 or 10 gram packs, with larger quantities available upon request!

Cherry Poppin' Nails only uses professional, high quality, solvent resistant glitter in all mix products!

name: 'Bitchy Barbie' Glitter Mix
description:
Bitchy barbie is a neon pink in your face mix of neon pink pigment, pink micro glitter and silver holographic micro glitter dust.

Here's the twist, this mix is also glow in the dark! Hit the lights and watch your nails glow bright! Just be sure to have them charged in any UV light source (UV Lamp, Sunlight etc.)

With pigmented mixes please ensure to give them a good mix before using to make sure the pigments are dispersed evenly.

Available in Raw or Pre-Mixed with Clear Acrylic Powder in 5 or 10 gram packs, with larger quantities available upon request!

When purchased raw this can be added to your own preference of acrylic, gel, nail polish or used for nail art. 

Cherry Poppin' Nails only uses professional, high quality, solvent resistant glitter in all mix products!

name: *DISCONTINUED* 'Kandi Land' Glitter Mix *LIMITED EDITION*
description:
Kandi Land is a mixture of neon hex glitters, star, butterfly, heart and daisy glitters and also pink, blue and yellow micro glitters.

Inspired by the Kandi style jewelery that ravers where, this will bring and exciting pop of brightness to your nails!

This mix is limited edition and there is only 12 available, all available come only pre-mixed and in 5 Gram packs. This far there is no raw mixes of this available.

Cherry Poppin' Nails only uses professional, high quality, solvent resistant glitter in all mix products!
